com.github.wuic.engine.impl.ehcache
Class DefaultEhCacheProvider

java.lang.Object
  com.github.wuic.engine.impl.ehcache.DefaultEhCacheProvider
All Implemented Interfaces:
CacheProvider<Cache>, WuicEhcacheProvider
public class DefaultEhCacheProvider
extends Object
implements WuicEhcacheProvider

This class is used by default to retrieve the cache for WUIC from EHCache framework. To perform it, a new CacheManager is created with the ehcache.xml path located at the root of the 'classpath'. When the CacheManager is created, a cache named 'wuiCache' is returned.

Since:
0.2.2
Version:
1.2
Author:
Guillaume DROUET
